key_risks: Legal and regulatory challenges, including FTC settlement and class action lawsuits
Economic sensitivity to housing market volatility and rising interest rates
Regulatory risks from potential changes in housing laws
controversies: FTC settlement for deceptive practices and undisclosed fees
Class action lawsuits over illegal late rent penalties and fees
Criticism for poor tenant relations and aggressive eviction practices
environmental_issues: None explicitly mentioned, but sustainability initiatives are noted
social_issues: Poor tenant relations, including excessive fees and inadequate maintenance
Aggressive eviction practices and negative publicity
governance_issues: Legal liabilities and ethical concerns impacting brand reputation
Questions about transparency of self-reported tenant satisfaction data
